root.name: The Swindle
root.description: OverviewThe Swindle is the new game from Dan Marshall, known from such games as Ben There, Dan That! and Time Gentlemen, Please!.The game is about you infiltrating various facilities to steal their money and then escape, and there are multiple ways to complete that task. You can for example take the stealthy route and try to enter through a skylight on the roof, or maybe tackle it head-on and hack the security cameras before blowing up a wall and going in guns blazing.The Swindle has a steampunk aesthetic, and in keeping with that your character has a pair of steampunk gloves, which can be upgraded with the money you have gathered throughout your missions. The upgrades range from faster hacking to double-jumps and telekinesis.
